goals__remit: Electrolux is a European based global household appliance manufacturer. In 2017, our global sales amounted to around 13 billion €, we had 60.000 employees and a production of more than 50 million appliances. In Europe, Electrolux has 16 factories and around 22.000 employees. We produce washing machines, dish washers, tumble driers, vacuum cleaners, refrigerators and freezers, and cooking equipment. Legislation and product requirements influence our activity to a great extent. The activities related to EU decision making are performed by the Environmental & European Affairs Department located in Brussels and in Stockholm. The department monitors development of EU legislation that can have an impact on our products and operations. If legislation has an impact on our products and operations we will seek to explain to decision makers what the impact is and how legislation can be improved if necessary.
